packages.title: Mid-Air Portals
packages.author: PortalRunner
packages.description:
Lets you place portals mid-air.

Portals cannot be placed on solid surfaces - placement is instead forced 128 Hammer units in front of the player, facing them. Chamber doors and fizzlers will reject portals, but other than that, no placement restrictions apply.

packages.title: Rockets Made Possible
packages.author: Archer and PortalRunner
packages.description:
Basically PortalRunner's "Rocket Launcher" mod, but with the maps modified to make the game beatable.

Currently, getting Betsrighter in wakeup is required for the intended solution.

packages.title: Odyssey Mod
packages.author: PortalRunner
packages.description:
Brings the movement, capture mechanics and collectibles from Super Mario Odyssey to Portal 2.

The controls are very similar to those in Super Mario Odyssey. Treat your crouch key as the ZL/ZR buttons, your use key as X/Y, and of course, your jump key as A/B.

You'll have to collect moons which will let you progress to the next chapter. Some are easy, but 100% completion is quite a challenge.

packages.title: Reverse Mod
packages.author: PortalRunner
packages.description: Chell goes back to sleep, undoing the chaos on her way back by unsolving test chambers and returning the facility to how it was when she woke up.

packages.title: Gravity Redirect
packages.author: PortalRunner
packages.description: Gravity follows your feet. Every time you go through a portal, you are rotated so that the exit portal is on the ceiling.

packages.title: Offset Mod
packages.author: PortalRunner
packages.description:
You can create an anchor point, move any distance away from it, and then use that offset on a different position. In simpler terms, you can pocket your movement for later.

Use your co-op ping bind to create and apply offsets.

packages.title: Vacuum Portals
packages.author: PortalRunner
packages.description: Every time you open a portal, you are pulled towards it with a practically irresistible force. This effect persists until you go through a portal. Idea by Mysheus.

packages.title: Infinite Portals
packages.author: PortalRunner
packages.description:
Every time you open a pair of portals, it starts a new set and locks in the previous one.

A locked-in set of portals cannot be moved or replaced. Passing through a fizzler will not work either.

packages.title: Random Maps
packages.author: Cosmic and PortalRunner
packages.description: Ever wanted to see what Portal 2 would be like if it had a Random map order? no, you didn't? well I made it anyway.

packages.title: Sonic Portals
packages.author: DerDilla (v=98)
packages.description:
Everytime you place a portal, your speed increases.

This mod starts as soon as you get the dual portal device (incinerator). The first 2 Portals don't increase speed.
The speed multiplier is calculated using the formula v(x) =(1/3)*(54-50/x) where x is the amount of counted portals placed.

packages.title: Everything Swapped
packages.author: PortalRunner
packages.description: Cubes are swapped with buttons, laser emitters are swapped with receivers, funnels are swapped with bridges, gels are randomized, you get the idea.

packages.title: Prop Swap
packages.author: PortalRunner
packages.description:
Looking at a prop and pressing the co-op ping key (F by default) makes you and the prop swap places.

Props are not solid and cannot pass through portals. The use key still works on things like buttons and cores.

packages.title: Magnetic Portals
packages.author: PortalRunner
packages.description: Blue portal repels, orange portal attracts.

packages.title: Rocket Launcher
packages.author: PortalRunner
packages.description:
Replaces the portal gun with a rocket launcher. Left mouse button to fire. Allows for rocket jumping.

Currently unbeatable without skipping certain levels.

packages.title: Backpack Mod
packages.author: lillith and Soulfur
packages.description:
Portal 2, but you get a backpack.. pretty convenient!

IMPORTANT: For custom backpack navigation keybinds, read 'Portal 2/portal2_tempcontent/cfg/backpack_binds.cfg'

Credits:
Black_Semka, lampishboi - Bug testing
Soulfur - Mod picture

packages.title: Liquid Lasers
packages.author: PortalRunner
packages.description: All lasers are now liquid. On an unrelated note, repulsion gel is now red.

packages.title: DeathBox
packages.author: Cosmic and PortalRunner
packages.description:
Portal 2 but a Deadly box follows you and tries to kill you.

The box will gain speed whenever you enter a portal.

packages.title: Wormhole Balance
packages.author: PortalRunner
packages.description:
In order to prevent test subjects from inadvertently forming black holes via misuse of wormhole warping technology, the operational range of the Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device has been restricted to a ±10kg mass difference between all interlinked portals.

In layman's terms, if heavy thing goes into portal A, heavy thing must also go into portal B.

packages.title: Floor is Lava
packages.author: PortalRunner
packages.description: Don't stop hopping!

packages.title: Magnet Balance
packages.author: PortalRunner, im_leia
packages.description:
Simulates wormhole gravity accumulation via the use of heavily exaggerated magnets. In other words, combines the Wormhole Balance and Magnetic Portals mods for an interesting combination.

Both mods authored by PortalRunner, combination made by im_leia.

packages.title: Cold Potato
packages.author: PortalRunner
packages.description: Once you pick up an object, letting go of it quickly drains your health. You cannot pass through portals until you've picked something up in the current level. If you have, elevator rooms also become safe zones. Props don't collide with the player or each other.

packages.title: Portal 2: Grapple Gun
packages.author: Rip Rip Rip
packages.description:
A mod where the portal gun, is replaced by a grapple gun.
-----
Controls:
Left-Click - Set a grapple point/Grab object from far away.
Right-Click (whilst holding Left-Click) - Move to grapple point.
-----
Extra features:
- Fully playable P2 campaign! Maps which would have previously been impossible with just the grapple gun have been altered to now be possible, meaning you can play through the whole original campaign without (hopefully) any issues!
-----
Credits:
Badpoolinator - Playtesting, feedback.
laVashik - Vscript Library

packages.title: Portal 2: Grapple Gun - No Altered Maps
packages.author: Rip Rip Rip
packages.description:
A mod where the portal gun, is replaced by a grapple gun.
-----
Note: This version DOES NOT INCLUDE the edited versions of the P2 Campaign maps! A good amount of maps will be impossible to complete without cheats!
-----
Controls:
Left-Click - Set a grapple point/Grab object from far away.
Right-Click (whilst holding Left-Click) - Move to grapple point.
-----
Extra features:
- (Not in this version) Fully playable P2 campaign! Maps which would have previously been impossible with just the grapple gun have been altered to now be possible, meaning you can play through the whole original campaign without (hopefully) any issues!
-----
Credits:
Badpoolinator - Playtesting, feedback.
laVashik - Vscript Library

packages.title: Maxwell The Companion Cat
packages.author: lillith
packages.description: In the rise of anxiety among test subjects. A solution was found, the Companion Cat™.
